content.rendered:
Directed by K.D. Satyam.

Written by K.D. Satyam. K.D. Satyam. K.D. Satyam. Anand Vrs Tomar.

Cast Raima Sen(Imli). Salim Diwan(Rohit Gupta). Ashish Vidyarthi(Vishnu Srivastava). Karuna Pandey(Lata Srivastava). Vineet Kumar Singh(Daman). Robin Das(Sundar Das) . Gautam Agarwal(Film Director). Itisha Ahuja(Tv Reporter). Praveen Arora(Rohit’s Father). Chandra Bisht(Rohit’s Mother). Nishith Broker(Rohit’s Manager). Diptusha Ganguly(Mili (Imli’s Daughter)). Ankit Hans(Reality Anchor Male). Hemlal(Vishnu’s Colleague 2). Farhan Rehman Khan((Armaan)). Ekavali Khanna(Raveena (Judge 1)). Riya Khaund(Guddi).Riya Khound. Naresh Kumar(Rashid). Rahul Kumar(Dancer). Shouvik Mondal(Rohit’s Brother). Monica Murthy(Rohit’s Colleague). Poorva Neeraj(Reality Anchor Female). Moumita Pandit(Imli’s sister). Krishna Raaz(Didi). Manish Shankar(Hussain (Judge 3)). Anil Sharma(Vishnu’s Colleague 1). Shiv Sharma(Chetan). Amar Shrivas(Vishnu’s Colleague 3). Mohit Tripathi(Rakesh Batra (Judge 2))

Language Hindi.

Producers Mangesh Bhalerao. Dr. Sattar Diwan. Vinod Kumar. Prakash Nathan. K.D. Satyam. K.D. Satyam. Preeti Singh.

Production Rehab Pictures Private Limited.
